text: This is awesome Felix! I was thinking kind of along the lines of optimizing some process to produce "clean" numbers.

text: NiceNumbers.jl is more for ensuring that some algorithm runs through without producing non-nice numbers. So that it seems plausible to do it by hand. At least that was the original motivation behind it.
